name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada
summary: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada is a real time strategy adaptation of Games Workshop’s famous tabletop game. Set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the game stages the mighty armada of the Imperial Navy’s Battlefleet Gothic against the insidious and galaxy threatening Chaos Black Crusade.
info:
• 中文名: 哥特舰队：阿玛达
  • 发行: Focus Home Interactive
  • 平台: Windows
  • 游戏类型: RTS
  • 发行日期: 2016
  • 官方网站: http://www.battlefleetgothic-armada.com/
